newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka stocks end unmoved, buyers on sidelines.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka stocks end unmoved, buyers on sidelines.

text.p: Sri Lanka stocks closed barely moved in Friday trade which was made lethargic by mid-week holidays, brokers said.
The all-share index closed 0.68 points lower at 727.32. Price declines edged out gains by 25 to 22. Aitken Spence fell 2.25 rupees to 155.25, while Haycarb fell two to 91.
"Friday was lethargic as expected, due to the mid-week holidays," said Aslem Ahmed of CDIC Sasoon Cumberbatch.
Wednesday and Thursday were public and market holidays due to a Buddhist religious festival, which led to many investors staying away on Friday too, brokers said.
